participant_1.background:
I like to take my time getting ready in the morning, then grab a quick coffee and head out on my daily drive.
I do laundry once a week to keep my home clean and tidy.
i am a nurse and work in an emergency room at a busy hospital.
i like going barefoot.
sometimes , people worry i am crazy.

participant_2.background:
I want to learn how to finish drywall like my dad.
traveling and making friends is something i find delightful.
i once started a forest fire in california.
i am interested in producing music.
I love Disney movies, so I would have a crib mobile with Disney characters on it in my baby's nursery.

content.text: Hello, what is something you like to do in the morning?
I like to start my day with a cup of coffee and a morning stretch.
That sounds relaxing. I need to get into the habit of drinking more coffee.
It's great, especially if you're a morning person. What do you do for work?
I'm a nurse and I work in an emergency room.
Oh wow, that must be a lot of pressure. Are you able to handle it well?
I try my best, but sometimes it can be overwhelming.
I can imagine. I'm glad you're able to stay calm under pressure.
Thank you, I appreciate that.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the beach and relax. I also like to go for walks in the park.
Those both sound like great ways to relax. I love the beach.
Me too, it's so peaceful.
What are your favorite Disney movies?
I love all of them, but my favorites are The Little Mermaid and Beauty and the Beast.
Those are both great movies. I love the music in them.
Me too, they're so catchy.
I'm glad we have similar interests.
Me too. It's always nice to talk to someone who understands you.
I agree
